message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.HPC, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses a pilot system designed for executing heterogeneous and dynamic workloads on HPC systems. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories related to distributed computing, high-performance computing, and system software. 

- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely sub-category as it directly relates to the paper's focus on executing workloads on HPC systems. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is also likely as the paper discusses the design and implementation of the RADICAL-Pilot system. 
- cs.Distributed (Distributed Computing) is another possible sub-category as the paper discusses the use of pilot systems for distributed computing. 
- cs.HPC (High Performance Computing) is also possible as the paper focuses on executing workloads on HPC systems. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses system software and the design of the RADICAL-Pilot system.
